posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I'm looking to pick up a nice presentable T5 Pinkerton Cabinet. I'd prefer a cabinet with the border still intact. The card doesn't have to be numerically graded as long as the cabinet is complete. I don't have a player preference and would just like to pick up a nice looking example. My budget is $400. If you can help me, please do send me a scan. Thanks.

E-mail: [url]rare_baseballstuff@yahoo.com[/url]

Here's one currently on Ebay that looks to be right up your alley. Good luck!!

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/1911-Pinkerton-Cabinet-T5-Paddy-Livingston-SGC-30-/360295035686?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item53e341f326[/url]
Yes an a very great guy to deal with and talk to.
I'd seen that one. Great card but I'd like to pick up one with a little more eye appeal. Tack holes don't bother me so long as the eye appeal remains strong.
